preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: Thumper is an implementation of the RFC-3161 secure time stamping service. The client is used to request time stamps for documents provided as files, and can also verify those time stamps. The server, running as a trusted third party, is used to create time stamps with cryptographic assurance of validity.

The primary purpose of Thumper is as a SPARK technology demonstration and as an educational vehicle for the exploration of high integrity programming techniques. Thumper is implemented in the SPARK 2014 language and requires SPARK GPL 2015.
